text: We were coming in from out of town and my crown snapped on my front tooth. They worked me in and even saw me early since we got into town earlier than expected. resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review Liz!  We so appreciate your thoughtfulness here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry!  We hope you enjoyed the concert and safely made it home!

name: Randy Wedel
text: I was in Gulf Shores on a family vacation and chipped a tooth. Concerned that I might have cracked the tooth I searched for a local dental practice that could help in a hurry. Thanks to Google reviews I lucked out and found Dr Edwards and Doctor Long. I was in the chair quickly and Dr Long did a thorough evaluation and gave me three options. Since I was there I chose to have the tooth repaired. 20 quick minutes I was fixed and on the way back to the beach. Painless, professional, and very kind. Also thanks to Lu Lu for scheduling me in so quickly and assisting in the procedure. I can assure you If I lived in the area, these would be my dentists. Thanks again Dr Long

resp.text: Randy, we so appreciate the 5 STAR review!  Here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry we try to accommodate our emergencies so that they may enjoy their vacations!  We hope you had a great time at the beach!

name: Aubrey Bianco
text: The women at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry are kind, caring, and very professional. The office space is beautiful and clean, and they take responsible COVID precautions to keep everyone as safe as possible. They all had my best interest at heart during procedures, whether that was a simple teeth cleaning or tooth filling. Dr. Mary was even willing to fit me in for an additional filling the same day, even if that meant cutting her lunch a little short....oh, and not to mention, that was on all on her birthday!! I recommend these ladies to anyone and everyone visiting the island or living here full time!

resp.text: Thank you Aubrey for the sweet review:)  We appreciate you as a patient here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry and glad we can help!

name: Matt Mcclane
text: Absolutely amazing family of dentists. Always polite and very helpful have always got me right in especially if it’s an emergency I drive over an hour to see them every time. The only dentists I will use.

resp.text: Thank you Matt for the 5 STAR review!  We hope you are well and call us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry if you need anything!

name: Sue Ann B
text: I would give them 10 stars if I could 😀!  I called with an emergency when I broke my tooth and they were able to get me in.  Everyone in the office was so kind and caring.  Kim took the time to explain everything they were going to do and stayed with me through the entire process.  Dr. Long was amazing and one of the best dentist I have ever been to!  She was able to repair my tooth and made sure I was comfortable during the procedure.  I would highly recommend them!  They represent the best of the best of Gulf Shores!

resp.text: Thank you so much Sue Ann! It was a pleasure to treat you here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry and look forward to seeing you again!

name: Pat Nadolski
text: My husband and I spend winters in Gulf Shores.  On New Year’s Day I broke a molar and was very concerned about finding a dentist.  No worries, we were able to make an emergency appointment to see Dr. Mary.  What a positive experience!  Everyone was professional and best of all friendly, showing a genuine interest in getting to know a little about me personally.  I highly recommend this practice.  We will definitely return here for all of our dental needs.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words, we enjoy having you as a patient here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry.

name: Shelly Sharkey
text: An awful experience. Easily spent 45 mins in Dr Pamela Edwards office without ever even speaking to the doctor and basically just lectured at and sent away with no resolution. Called a different dentist the same day and within a week, my daughter has had a full exam, xrays and multiple apts completed and has her front teeth fixed and her smile back, which everyone deserves. I was just dumbfounded that the doctor wouldn’t even come out of her personal office to speak to us as a new patient in her office, and the condescending treatment by her assistant or hygienist or whoever she was, was mind blowing.  Let alone the issues to even get an appointment scheduled in the first place and then it was the “wrong type” appointment I was informed when we arrived. Don’t worry about my too complicated daughters case Dr. Edwards, it was easily resolved by another Dentist willing to take the time.

resp.text: Hi Shelly, We would like to apologize for your negative experience. We’re normally known for our exceptional patient care, and we regret that we missed the mark. My name is Bryan and I am the office manager. If you’d like to discuss this further, please contact me at (251) 500-1025 so we can work toward making this right.

name: Glenda Sickles
text: This dentistry office is incredible.  I'm a Snowbird in Gulf Shores, Alabama and had a bridge fall out.  Away from home with a dental problem...what to do?  Family Dentistry has an ad in the local paper that they  love winter guests and accept emergencies.  I was both!!  They gave me an appointment the next day, took impressions, pulled a tooth and in three weeks I had a new bridge.  Dr. Mary Edwards-Long is kind, compassionate, and all procedures were pain-free.  She is friendly and we visited like old friends.  Her assistants, Kim 1 and Kim 2, were equally caring and efficient.  The whole office was careful with Covid 19 practices in place.  I can highly recommend this dentistry office!

resp.text: Thank you so much Glenda for the stellar 5 star review!  We so enjoyed having you as a patient this winter here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry  and hope you stop by to say hello when you return next winter!

name: Renee Ziegelbauer
text: It was a very satisfying experience. Got an appointment right away and everyone was very friendly. Dr Edwards fixed my broken tooth as good as new and I never felt a thing. I recommend this practice highly.

resp.text: Thank you Renee for the stellar 5 star review!  You were a pleasure here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry and we hope you have a wonderful time in our small beach town!

name: Laurence Waterford
text: Painless, efficient, and reasonable! It was easy to get a new patient appointment:) Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you Laurence for the 5 star review!  We look forward to seeing you again here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry!

resp.text: Dear Lizzy, thank you so very much for the lovely review. We enjoy having you as a patient here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry and hope all is well with you and yours. Please come by and see us anytime!

resp.text: Thank you so much David for your kind words. We love having you as a patient here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry. See you next time.

The dentist and the receptionists made wife and husband both feel at ease. Hubby says if we didn’t live 1000 miles away they would be our primary dentist office. Thank you ladies for all of your effort and making both hubby and myself less stressed about an already stressful situation.

resp.text: Mrs. Trimpey, Thank you so much for the 5 STAR google review!  We are happy we could help in your time of need and please come visit us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry if you are ever in the area again to say hello:)

text: I was on vacation and needed an emergency visit.   I called and got an immediate appointment.   Due to COVID, I was met at my car for a temperature check/screening  and then taken right in. I highly recommend this dentist office.  The dentist, assistant, and office staff are exceptional.  Wish they were in my home state.  I’d switch dentist if they were.

resp.text: Thank you so much Dot for the stellar 5 star google review!  We hope you had a wonderful weekend and we would be happy to take care of you next time you are down here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry:)

text: Dr. Edwards is an awesome dentist! I have had a lot of dental work done by her, and I have been very satisfied with every aspect of it. She and her staff are very professional, caring and helpful. I would highly recommend.

name: Amie McCully
text:
I am astounded by the absolutely stellar care & treatment I received from Dr. Edwards as well as her entire team. I have put off much needed dental work for years and am so grateful to be following through with this office.

I felt beyond at ease during my appointments which involve receiving crowns; all of my interactions with everyone apart of this team has far exceeded all of my expectations.

I am especially grateful for their professional/gentle/educational approach; very thankful for all their assistance in working with our confusing insurance issues!

I highly recommend Dr. Edwards and her excellent team; looking forward to their services in the future.  So happy to finally having all of my teeth & maintaining my smile!

resp.text: Wow Amie!  We so appreciate the awesome review of us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry!

text: Love coming here! Dr. Pamela and Dr. Mary are excellent and love what they do. Highly recommend!

text: Dr. Mary and the entire staff at Dr. Pamela Edwards Family Dentistry are fantastic. Anytime visitors to our area need an emergency dentist visit, I recommend them and they always come through. Just yesterday, I had a major tooth ache and they worked me in immediately. Problem solved and feeling great! Thanks Dr. Mary!

resp.text: Thank you Taylor for the awesome google review of us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry and so happy you're feeling better!

name: Derek
text:
The absolute most reliable, friendly, and efficient dentist and staff you’ll not just find in Gulf Shores, but in Alabama. Period.

Doctor Mary, Kat, Brian (and the entire team) fixed my teeth and made my cosmetic experience actually enjoyable. They also made me feel great about myself, so I can’t thank them enough. The best in the biz.

resp.text: Thank you, we look forward to seeing you again.

name: Tamoya Thompson
text: If I could rate their office more than a 5 star, I absolutely would. I had a cleaning done and 2 fillings last week, and it was such a great experience. Nobody describes having to get a filling as a great experience, but from the minute you are greeted upon entrance right through the dental process was just absolutely great service right through. I would recommend here to anyone. Both Dr. Edwards's are amazing and their wonderful staff. I have more dental work to get done and I don't  plan on going anywhere else but here!! Thank you guys a million times!!

resp.text: Thank you, hope to see you soon here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry .

name: Carol Fountain
text: It was last Friday I saw Dr Mary Edwards. I was in a lot of pain from a problem tooth and my regular dentist was not open on Friday..Dr Edwards was a God-send to me. I was able to get in to see her right away and she and her staff were able to determine my problem, refer me to specialist , and give me an antibiotic prescription to get me by until I could be seen by my regular dentist in 4 days. Her office is warm and welcoming and I would switch dentists if my insurance would let me. Cannot say enough good things about the whole experience.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words of us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry .

name: Betty Kelley
text:
Came to Gulf Shores for family vacation.  First family drama was my bridge falling out.
I also have a terrible fear of dentists.  Thank goodness for Dr. Edwards.  They had me fixed by 10 am Monday morning.  They could not have nicer, more professional and caring.  I wish she was in my hometown. Dr. Edwards and her staff are the best!

resp.text: Thank you so much, we are here if you need us again at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry.

name: Dana Given
text:
Just came from my first visit at Dr. Edwards office. Everyone was great; from the initial appointment phone call two days ago;  to check in today (even when there was a glitch with my insurance); to X-rays, teeth cleaning, and follow up with Dr. Edwards.

Very professional and friendly staff; respectful with the glitch - which got resolved while I was in the dentist chair; gentle and thorough dental care.

It’s always scary trying to find a new dentist when you relocate - but I can highly recommend this office - whose entire staff obviously cares about their patients.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words.

name: Kathlene Smith
text: If you need an emergency crown replacement as I did,  this is the place to go! this is a family strong dental business and they treated us like family as well!  Thank you for your excellent service and care!

resp.text: Thank you so much Kathlene!  You are part of the Edwards Family now and we hope y'all have a wonderful trip!

name: Judi Farmer
text: I’m from out of town and went in for emergency help. Dr. Mary treated me and she is awesome! She diagnosed a cracked tooth and treated me on the spot. Dr. Mary and her staff were super caring. They even gave me a piece of king cake and a box of valentine chocolates when I left. What a super family team!

resp.text: Judi, we so appreciate the kind review of us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry !  You are part of the Edwards Family:)

name: Edward Williams
text: I was on vacation with my family when I chipped a tooth. Started thinking of a good story to tell my friends about how it happened. My wife said to call around to see if anyone could fix it. Dr. Edwards and her staff fit me in that day! Prices were fair and the doctor was fantastic. I was walking out smiling. Would recommend to anyone needing emergency or cosmetic treatment!

resp.text:
Dear Edward,

We are so happy we were able to help you in your time of need!  It was a pleasure to meet you and  your family.  We hope the rest of your vacation was wonderful and please stop by to say hello to us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry whenever you are back in the area!

name: Sarah Halford
text: We are visiting the area and my husband was incorrectly diagnosed by the minor med clinic after a week and 2 visits.  Dr Mary and her staff were able to see him right away, discover the real problem and get him on the road to recovery. The whole staff were knowledgeable and very caring. We will highly recommend their office to others.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words of us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry.

name: Jash Yotes
text:
The Edwards run a fantastic dental practice - whether it's locals or out-of-towners with dental emergencies.

Pamela and Mary so thoughtful, intelligent, and excellent at making patients feel welcome & cared for.

They're great with locals, (I'm one, ha!) but they've really distinguished themselves in what they're willing to do to accommodate all the visitors that we have in town with their dental emergencies. (And are the FIRST to tell folks on the phone that they need to go elsewhere [like the emergency room] if the problem sounds like a medical priority.)

Anyone on the fence should feel excellent about trusting the Edwards. They're a great, skilled, family run practice that are going to look out for their patients' best interest first.

Love you guys!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words.

name: Kinsley Lively
text: Such a wonderful experience!! I’m usually a little nervous about dentist appointments but the staff here was so welcoming and friendly. Dr. Edwards, the younger one, was so knowledgeable about my concerns (wisdom teeth coming in) and Star did a phenomenal job cleaning my teeth!! Pearly whites for the win! 😁

resp.text: Thank you, hope to see you again here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry.

name: Mike M
text:
I like to just say this is the best and most friendly dentist 🦷 office around
I just had work done and very professional
People 5 stars if I could give 10 stars I would
Highly recommended !!

Sincerely
Mike

resp.text: Dear Mike, Thank you so much for the kind review!  We look forward to seeing you again!

text: This office was great.  They worked with my crazy schedule to get me seen and their rates were very reasonable.  On top of that, their staff was very personable and polite.  I definitely recommend this dental office.

text: A great lady dentist that is caring, fun, and funny. I was very happy with my visit. Dr. Mary Edwards  was extremely professional, skilled and friendly. name: Shantel Ervin
text: As a cancer warrior, I have had my share of doctors appointments, treatments, surgical procedures and more. Because of this my pain threshold is high so if I say something hurts it really hurts. My previous dental office was aware of this yet the hygienist chose to ignore the pain I was experiencing. After speaking with the office manager I decided I would not complete my appointment and later called back and canceled any further treatment with that practice. I called my insurance company and located the office of a previous dentist that I loved and I am so glad I did. I called Bryant Dental on Bob Wallace and even the interaction over the phone was pleasant. Whitney was able to schedule me an appointment quickly and educated me on the processes and procedures and what to expect. I could hear her smile through the phone. The day of my appointment, the entire staff was absolutely wonderful! As a new patient for the practice I knew I would have paperwork and would probably be there for a while but as soon as I finished my paperwork my hygienist was waiting for me. Chelsey greeted me with smiling eyes (she had on her mask), explained the process in depth and after reviewing my x-rays she recommended the best next step to help with my issues. She listened and made sure to understand what I was experiencing and throughout my appointment she made sure the process was not causing too much pain. With tender swollen gums pain is to be expected however if the hygienist knows what they are doing the patient will experience minimal pain. Chelsey knows what she is doing! She took a potentially mouth throbbing, tears running uncomfortable situation and made it a pleasant and educational experience. I went in with my mouth feeling awful and because of what Chelsey did my teeth feel so much better. Because I am a cancer warrior my teeth and gums have gone through some major changes. Chemo, radiation and long term medication has caused damage that I thought was going to take radical treatment to repair but Chelsey explained how to minimize further damage and what to do to get me on a path of recovery. She was absolutely amazing! I highly recommend Bryant Dental on Bob Wallace, you will not be disappointed.

resp.text: Wow to that wonderful review!  We are so happy to hear about your great experience with us!  We will pass these sweet words you shared on to the staff and especially let Chelsey and Whitney know :)

text: Let me save some of you the trouble. They use Transworld System collection agency when Tonya makes a mistake with your treatment plan and tells you your insurance will pay half and you pay the other half ($560) and then it turns out TONYA read it wrong but expects the patient to pay for her mistake you will get turned over to a collection agency! I liked Dr. Bentley and was very disappointed she let her office manager get away with dirty office practices, so I had no other choice but to find another dentist for my son and I. Tonya wouldn’t let me speak to Dr. Bentley she twisted what happened to fit her narrative and let Dr.Bentley think they were doing me a favor by cutting the bill in half when all along Tonya knows this is on her! And she sent a $240 bill to collections on a procedure that wasn’t even done correctly (we were told my son didn’t need a crown turns out he did but because of Tonyas error reading our policy which is her job by the way we never went back to Dr.Bentley after getting a $500 bill in the mail no phone call Tonya knew I would be upset and she knew exactly what she told me) and the tooth had to be extracted after all of that! So NO  I do not recommend you go there! Not because of Dr. Bentley but because you cannot trust Tonya to do your insurance and billing correctly! Do you have an extra $1000.00  laying around when you get a surprise bill from Tonya? When I asked Tonya why she didn’t catch that the insurance wouldn’t cover that procedure she said to me well neither did you! Wow!! Tonya claimed to have gotten an approval for the procedure when all along root canals weren’t covered within the first year of coverage (so that was a lie to cover her mistake) I would have thought an office manager and the person who is supposed to verify insurance would check that first thing! I have never had this happen before over 30 years of taking myself and 2 kids to the dentist! So there you have it! Chelsea & Jennifer are great though!

resp.text: So sorry Colleen that there was any issue with your time with us at Bryant dental.  Unfortunately with insurance they always have the disclaimer that it is an estimate and not a guarantee of payment.  As a courtesy we strive to help our patients by handling all the dental billing rather than collecting all payments up front for procedures creating the hassle for the patient to handle all billing to his or her own insurance.  It's a partnership where we rely on what the insurance provides us and what the insurance provides to the patient about their own coverage.  We definitely do our best on our end to try to gather all the information about waiting periods, missing tooth clauses and percentages covered.  We will look into your account and see what happened in your situation.  Once again we apologize you had anything but the best experience with us!

name: Wendy Hambrick
text:
Very clean!!!  Where do I start they are truly a AWESOME TEAM!!  WONDERFUL with a lovely atmosphere. Awesome attitude each of the team, with every client that entered in the door. Like many I’m often nervous but not today thank God. They are Very gentle, and caring. Megan took care of me and she was Fantastic.
My husband said this is the only dentist office that made him feel confident in getting dental care.
Dr. Bentley is Super! We love the plan given and we’re  thankful to be patients. The business part at checkout, information given was great!!! The Hambrick’s are BLESSED and happy. Thanks Bryant Dental❤️

resp.text: Aw thank you so much Wendy for your positive review!  We are SO glad to hear you had a great experience with our team at Bryant dental!  We will pass your kind words on to the team! :)

name: Jeffrey Smith
text: Just returned from having a root canal at the Huntsville office..Terrible experience...assistant didn't introduce herself so I couldn't tell you her name or the dentist because he didn't either (when we were leaving my wife found out it was Dr. Willis)..no tell me what's going on or anything..I passed on info from previous dentist as was told to do but was quickly dismissed with we don't do that..just you need to see a specialist...how about what type of specialist? I informed them that cold water really hurts my teeth and dentist said, "Really nothing I can do about it unless I numb your mouth."  In addition, I told both that it does not feel numb where you put the shots..most dentists would probably give you another shot to help..not this one (wasn't even offered anesthesia)...of course they sprayed cold water in my mouth and I jumped you may need to know...dentist says I can't do anything if you jump to which I replied "That is why I told you prior to starting about what you may need to know!" Sprayed cold water in mouth and it sprayed all over my face no goggles and never wiped off my face.  Dentist went back and forth with me on why I was telling him anything about cold water or numbness..after getting through it there was no what to do if I experience pain afterwards, wife had to go back in and ask.  I found the dentist and assistant very rude and unprofessional.

resp.text: So sorry to hear you didn't have a great experience with us Jeffrey!  This definitely doesn't sound like the experience we want for any of our patients or that we typically have as our normal feedback.  I will reach out to the office manager and she will contact you.  We always want to create a wonderful experience for all our patients and will look into this complaint.

text: Apparently making the appointment is not confirmation enough that you want an appointment.  Warning, if you don't pick up the phone  to confirm your appointment they will cancel it! resp.text: We are very sorry to hear this Emily.  Due to six month checkups being made so far in advance, we have several communication protocols in place to confirm appointments through text, email and by phone to try to avoid this from ever happening.  We will have management personally reach out to you and try to get issues resolved our end.  We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced and will work to make sure it never happens again.

During the appointment day, I presented my Cigna card. Cleaning and Exam were done appropriately. Now Bryant Dental is trying to bill me, because they are not in network for my Cigna plan. Cigna did pay them for the services, but Bryant wants even more than what a cleaning and exam are. Under Cigna in network plan the cleanings and exam are 100 percent covered. I’ve talked to them about this to no avail.

I asked if I could be reimbursed for the splint the assistant manager stated she couldn't reimburse me. I have been going to Bryant dental for over a year and never had any problems until this splint. I had impressions done on this splint in December before the holidays its going on February and they never got it right! Very unprofessional and doesn't value good patients with longevity. text: I had the worst experience with this place. They had me come back over and over never once mentioning my balance. It had to be exactly what they wanted or they could not do the work to finish my procedure. I walked away with half of my mouth done. Then they wouldn't give me my xrays so I could get it done someplace else because I had a balance. So much for customer service. Also they called to remind me of an appointment for my daughter like I would bring my daughter there after that.

name: Trae L .
text: What a disturbed person. I went in for a filling for 180 dollars&l walked out without my money or my filling. Angela seems to think her office power spills over into legal power.. She said shes been out of the country so my refund will be at her discretion. l threatend with a lawyer & she laughed at me.Why is returning my money for services unrendered up to Angela? What a shady way to steal from unsuspecting people.. Why is this allowed? Should she be allowed to play around with patients money? She sure is a cold hearted women. Stealing is wrong anyway you look at it but,stealing from a disabled man on a fixed income is sick in the head...This is about the Decatur office.

name: Jetty Guliani
text: Terrible!!! Went there for a free teeth cleaning that was covered by my insurance. They dental assistant photographed my teeth and measured them.  They told me that they would need to do a 3 phase cleaning which will cost me over $700 with my insurance, I told them NO, I came here for a free cleaning.  I left and they sent me a bill for almost $200 for my supposedly FREE teeth cleaning.  They are some crooks, I wouldn't recommend them to anyone but my worse enemy.

name: Toni Worrell
text: I agree with jade... i am a severe Dentaphobe and called to change dentists after a bad experience with my other dentist.  My first visit was ok, but something seemed off.  I assumed it was my fear, and continued goung. I was told I would need a crown.  I show up terrified and they start working on me with nitrox. He says I don't  need it and after several minites, gives me the nitrox, but does not give it time to work. He then drills pokes and grinds, while I am crying. . They fit the temp crown and say I can pay when they put new crown on. I am then in  PAIN for 3 weeks. I go back in he says he wants to put me on steroids and pain meds, but he may have to do a root canal.  They will check to see how I am and setup another appointment.  NEVER HAPPENED.  got a bill in the mail for my crown that I never got... when I called them, their number listed on bill was disconnected. Can you say, "" you know a good attorney? "

Unfortunately, they charged my insurance $350.00+ for this one simple 15 minute procedure 😐. Over-charging insurance companies is the number one reason for high rates. Won't be going back.

resp.text: Hello Chris.  We are sorry that you are disappointed in our billing practices.  Just so you know, Dental Insurance works much differently than Medical Insurance.  What we "charged" your Dental Insurance makes no difference as the Insurance company sets the fees, not us.  We could have "charged" $1000 for the work you had done, and we would have been paid the same and written off a higher amount.  In fact, we typically have to write off ~33% of everything we do.  Most dental insurances companies haven't changed their fees in 5+ years, and we haven't raised our fees in the same time frame.  If you have any further questions in how Dental Insurance works, please feel free to give us a call.

name: Kristin W.
text:
I had a very, very bad experience here. Cindy did my cleaning, if you can call it that (bloodbath might be more accurate). The pick kept slipping and gouging my gums and it was extremely painful. According to her, my previous dental hygienists didn't do a thing to remove the plaque from my teeth because she announced that my mouth was in terrible shape, and didn't I know that I was supposed to brush my teeth regularly? When she started in on flossing and waggled her blood-stained fingers in front of my eyes, I got dizzy and started crying.

Dr. Peters came in next and said, "I hear you've been having some trouble! Did you know you're supposed to brush and floss your teeth? You have to be good about it, or else your teeth will end up looking like this..." at which point he gestured to a horrifying picture mounted on the wall featuring blackened and rotting teeth. He told me that my teeth shouldn't be so bad for someone my age and the cleaning shouldn't be so painful unless I haven't been taking care of them. People, I have been seeing dentists twice a year throughout my entire life, keeping up with my regular cleanings and x-rays, and no dentist has ever been this critical of me. I think Cindy was rough and careless, and defended herself against my crying by saying that I had terrible and highly sensitive teeth, and Dr. Peters took her at her word instead of asking her to leave the room and talking to me alone.

Between the condescension from both of them and the heavy-handed pick wielding, I will never ever recommend this practice, nor will I ever return there.

text: I’m super sad because I like Dr. Summerford. I have been a patient for many years and was told this last time that it was now $25 to reschedule an appointment within 24 hours. Anyone with a busy life knows that cleanings are scheduled months in advance and life issues can change in a second. I will be finding a new dentist.

resp.text: Ashlyn, we are truly sorry that you feel the need to leave, and we understand your frustration.  We've had to implement this new policy due to the increase in patients who cancel with short notice or don't even bother showing up to their appointment.  On average 20% of our appointments every day do this which inhibits us from scheduling appointments for those patients who want or need them on certain days or times.  We also reserve time and resources for these patients which are lost when appointments are lost.  We hope this might explain why we've had to implement this policy.

text: I had been going to this dental office for cleaning for 3-4  years until recently. Apparently the hygienist at Central Park Dental did not do a thorough job.

resp.text: Minehwa, we're sorry you feel like you received sub-optimal care at our office.  We can assure you, however, that every patient receives a thorough cleaning.  We accept nothing less.  We cannot comment on your situation due to HIPAA regulations.  As a general point of information, some patients acquire calculus buildup more easily and quickly than others due to factors both within their control and outside of their control.  For that reason, not all patients receive cleanings every six months although most do.  A small amount of patients require cleanings yearly while others require them every 3-4 months.  Again, we are sorry that you feel that you didn't receive the care you deserve, and if you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to call our office.

No introduction or anything. 5 mins later had one of the assistance come in and say “Dr Wright is sending you to an oral surgeon “.

If he couldn’t have performed the work that should’ve communicated before appointment, before wasting my time, before calling off work. I will never return here.

resp.text: Mr. Thomas, We apologize for the inconvenience and lack of full introduction to Dr. Wright. Once he was able to see your film and immediately saw based on that film that he could not extract your teeth he felt you would be better served with a specialist.  We did it like this so that we wouldn't waste anymore of your time because we did realize that you had been waiting for a while. We hope that you have had the service you desired and have found an acceptable dental home. If you have any questions or concerns or even suggestions for us, please do not hesitate to call us.

I genuienly look forward to conversation with her during my cleanings.
Dr. Maples has done filling work for me (yes shots and all) and each time I’ve walked away saying “gosh that was so easy!” I now live 3 hours away but I come back here for any dental work I need done. They are truly the best at what they do and are so focused on making their clients comfortable.

They walked him through the whole process and eazed all the anxiety my little one had. If I could give the staff more than 5 stars I would. They worked very fast and effective. The staff maintains a very clean environment and a very welcoming environment. I really applaud these ladies for the standard they have set during this epidemic and helping my family feel better about a scary procedure.

name: Sandy Smith
text:
Dr Tedder’s office is the best I have found for children’s dentistry. I started going to her in 2003 with my first granddaughter. I am now going to her with my second grandson although I’m 35 miles away.

Although COVID-19 has changed some things, the care starting at the reception area and continuing through checkout can’t be beat. They are so intuned to a child’s needs it instantly puts them at ease. Prior to COVID they would have several assistants working with your child. They talk to them massage their arms and legs while getting cleanings and fillings. Just beautiful 🥰

They make it a great experience for you and your child or grandchild. They leave happy and unafraid of coming back.

My boys were happy with their visit too. I wanted to find a dentist closer to home anyway, so it all worked out!  I am so happy I took them to see Dr. Tedder and her amazing staff!! text: My daughter started off going to the Bel Air Mall location the staff was wonderful. We changed locations due to us moving and for convenience.  The worst decision I ever made. I would call in to make appointments and would be left on hold entirely too long .I would try calling back and speak with someone and the girl would have a attitude.  I left word to speak to a clinical manager never received a call back.. I called for weeks about my daughter's retainer and I have yet to get a response or the retainer that was paid for in advance..every time I call im left on hold. They really need to change office staff or send them back through customer service training and discuss professionalism with them.

text: Had a very pleasant visit with Krisity the hygienist  she had an awesome personality and did a great job, also front staff was very nice as well!

name: BriAnna Gardner
text: If I could give this place a ZERO, I really would! I had 2 extractions done for my wisdom teeth on last week and I’m so happy that I was late or it would have been 4! I couldn’t imagine having 4 teeth pulled because this place sent me home with NO ANTIBIOTICS. Only pain pills! I noticed that the pain was beginning to be a bit unbearable so I called and ask if it was normal and if I could come in. The RECEPTIONIST proceeds to tell me that everything was normal. She’s not a dentist so I called back to schedule an appointment to come in. My appointment was at 4:00. I didn’t even make it to the back until 4:40 after asking if I was forgot about! A heavier set girl in at the front desk said very dry “well they had to squeeze you in” as if I was a burden or something!   She left for the rest of the day. The other RECEPTIONIST I asked ignored me when I told her I’d been there for 40 min and never even got up to see what was going on Smh! The entire time I’m sitting in the waiting area the vision department was clapping and dancing to music (imagine how that feels to hear loud clapping after having your teeth pulled) VERY unprofessional! I finally was in the back at this point. The assistant that helped me was very nice and patient! I hate the fact that I didn’t get her name but I loved her attitude and how she was willingly trying to help me! I was sent home with antibiotics! The same antibiotics they said they didn’t give after a extraction smh and steroids for my swelling. He also gave me more tabs for pain as if I’m a junky or something or if that was going to make me happy. I’m not going back at all. Thanks but no thanks. On another note! They need to get better receptionist or this place will be going down hill! Never ever again

name: Hermosa Travels
text: Mobile Bay Dental is HORRIBLE all the staff needs to go to customer service 101everytime I come here for an appointment there is new staff no consistency at all you can't build a patient and staff relationship which is very important to some patient who comes and get dental work every 6 months. And the new dentist  they have now is TERRIBLE Dr. Rich that is he has no people skills and he preformed a horrible job on my fillings leaving me unable to floss and with a uneven bit for 4 days I had to make appointment with another dentist Dr. Rich was also flirting with his assistant making me feel very uncomfortable I wouldn't recommend Dr. Rich to work on a animal's mouth so please DO NOT take your family here

text: This place is not the same since Dr Joshua  Dabbs left. I was not happy with the care received by one of the other doctors so I google searched for Dr Dabbs new location. Thankfully I found him at Advanced Dental Comfort, Fairhope, AL. I drive from Mobile to see him, very easy drive and now I'm back to receiving that exceptional and warm hearted care that I missed :)

name: Billy Bowyer
text: When we arrived they were having issues with their computer. However the professionalism with which the staff carried themselves, we never knew the computers were down until they told us. They were extremely prompt yet we never felt rushed. My daughter was nervous but due to the kind nature of all the staff she began to relax and actually enjoyed herself. The staff was kind, courteous and very informative. When you couple these attributes with the indoor playground, it's a Kidz Paradise wrapped in a dental office

name: Brittany Gamble
text: I love that I’m able to come right after work. Everyone here is so nice and hospitable. I had a great experience!  Christy was amazing and so patience! She was able to explain to me all of my questions and concerns! Can’t wait for my next cleaning!! :)

name: Myeshia Smith
text: Dr Hankinson the owner and doctor at mobile bay dental in Semmes is very rude and so not kid friendly today was his second time being rude to my daughter once before he was rude to her at the bel air location my daughter was crying a little because she was scared to get teeth pulled and he told me he was not fixing to deal with that he didn’t even give my daughter a chance to calm down before he jumped up off his stool snatched his gloves off and walked out the room with no explanation he was extremely rude to us for the second time I will never take my daughter back to mobile bay ever again he has no patience for kids he told me once a bel air mall when my daughter cried he recommended the Semmes location because they were more kid friendly and now we go there this morning and his not kid friendly self was there I was extremely upset at how he treated us both times but today to find out he was the owner really took the cake for me

name: Monet Monet
text: The best dentist office I’ve ever been to!!! My 1 year old daughter felt so comfortable letting them assist her. No literally, you’ll fall IN LOVE with the staff! This is by far the most positive energy.. great atmosphere while waiting to be serviced.. very professional place of business with outstanding personality! They’re patient and they also make you so comfortable. I highly recommend this dentist office. Airport & Semmes location

name: Sara Pate
text: My children have been going to this dentist since they opened years ago... never had a problem, always very friendly, kind and helpful staff. Today on the other hand, I took all 3 of our kids in for their 6 mth checkup and cleaning. The hygienist was WONDERFUL.. the dentist/owner on the other hand was rude, arrogant, and crass. When he told me my oldest had a very deep cavity, I asked how it had gotten so deep in 6 mths, he chuckled and said oh we probably missed it the last time! Also when asking about dental issues that may arise with my daughter who has an autoimmune disease, I was met with incorrect, unsolicited medical advise infront of a room full of people that was very demeaning and humiliating! Needless to say I will be taking our business elsewhere.

name: Elizabeth Moses
text: Front desk was very welcoming! Dental hygienist were GREAT, especially Danielle!! we came in, they did their jobs and we got out at a good time. Highly recommend! Never a bad experience.

name: Liz Stringfellow
text: I’ve been waiting  for four months now for the vision Dr. to except the Medicaid they except Medicaid but not now. If you except Medicaid in the pass you should not stop because of a pandemic. Not right

resp.text: Our Belair Mall location is accepting all patients at this time. Please feel free to give us a call at 251-301-6555.

name: celeste Salazar
text: They called me back almost immediately and sat me in a room for TWO HOURS. After the first hour they numbed my mouth and then made me sit in there alone for another hour. Told the doctor I had been waiting for two hours and he dismissed me & they released me as a patient because I was annoyed of waiting two hours and waiting an hour with my mouth numb. Wasn’t gonna come back anyways 🤣✌🏼 Weak place frfr .

text: I always enjoy my visits here at Mobile Bay Dental! They are so very nice and sweet! Always make me feel like I am at home! I love the way Patrica cleans my teeth!

On my last visit, Gabby in Vision went the extra mile to help me as I was picking up a frame for my sons new glasses. She heard what I was looking for and helped me find it. She was patient and helpful. I appreciated that she was not in a rush just to get it done, but was attentive and giving me great customer service. I would 100% recommend this place for anyone with children.

name: Margaret Texmed
text: I Always leave here feeling great about my teeth. Danelle was amazing and so knowledgeable about her craft. Love that they all do their best to save my teeth. See you soon Mobile Bay Dental.

text: Love the staff of the dental and vision. It's very family friendly and the staff are very accommodating. It even has a little door for little kids to come in and feel independent.

name: Lori Oliver
text: This place is great! When I first walked in it was a little hectic, they have a play area for kids which is amazing, but the also have a adult only waiting room which was very nice. The staff here is top notch. Everyone from the girl at the desk that checked me in to the dentist was friendly and knowledgeable. I have a little anxiety when seeing any doctor and the dentist was kind and understanding of that. I had a tooth pulled, painless and unbelievably quick. I would recommend this place to anyone! Thank you Mobile Bay dentist!

text: The staff at mobile bay dental did a wonderful job for me and my children today. Danielle was the best, and I couldn’t have accomplished 3 cleanings at once without them.

text:
most unprofessional business I've ever dealt with.
won't let me give zero stars.

do yourself a favor and go elsewhere.

Madison and Kelly made my daughter feel extra special and they took care of us quickly. They accept All Kids and have a nice waiting room. The kids dental area has seating for parents and vibrant saltwater fish decor.

name: Gail Shields
text: Dr. Gast and his assistant are AMAZING! I have had several dental issues, and he ALWAYS takes his time and does a remarkable job. He is extremely professional, and cares about his patients. His assistant does also. I wish I could give them both more stars, but he will forever be my dentist. His office staff is ALWAYS friendly. I highly recommend Dr. Gast and his staff.

name: Victoria Meeks
text: I love Dr Perry, and staff !!

name: bex bama
text:
I went to this dentist a few months ago to have a crown glued back in. It only took approximately 2 minutes, total. However, I was in the office well over 3 hours. When I left, the lobby lights were off, no staff was available to check me out. The crown hasn’t come out since but a patient’s time should be considered. The fact that crown is still holding is the only reason they get 1 star.
Now, I brought my mother in today for an extraction. Although she was called back just 7 minutes past her appointment time, I fear I will be waiting for them to finish the job till the lobby is closed yet again.
I, personally, will not continue seeing the dentists at Mobile Bay Dental because I do value my time. Apparently, the staff at this particular dentist does not.

name: James Bosarge
text: it was a great experience!

name: Cassandra Dumas
text: The dentist was super nice and kept coming back to check on my daughter just to see her reaction of her new caps which she loves. Just putting in the extra effort was amazing. Kelly was super sweet and she gets five stars from us any day. Thanks so much for a wonderful experience. We love you Kelly!!!!!

name: ADAM N
text: Mobile Bay Dental is the best dentist's office I've ever been to. Super clean. Friendly staff. Great service.

Great care, made sure I was comfortable. Was one of the best visits I've had to the dentist! The price was also more fair than others I shopped around with. Was fortunate enough they could squeeze me in on a Friday on short notice.
I will definitely be back for the rest of the work I need! Thanks to the staff I had working on me!

name: Manuella Coleman
text: I went to the location in the mall and everyone is nice friendly and helpful. The dentist is very kind and considerate of how much pain you are in and tries to be gentle. I am definitely going to come back.

name: Melia Nicholson-Franklin

Truly recommend this location for the entire family.

name: Christina Daughtry
text: My eight year old had a horrific experience a couple of years ago when having dental work done. The young lady, Jessica, who helped him was very friendly and understanding. After administering nitrous oxide, my son calmed down and the procedure was completed very quickly and painlessly. I am extremely grateful for the patience, understanding and level of professionalism I experienced during our visit and would recommend this dental practice to all of my friends and family.

name: Kimberly Chappell
text: Well, I will never go back there, because they charge you taxes on your total  bill instead of charging you taxes on what you pay!!!! I ended up paying $100 extra then I would have if I went somewhere else!!! They need to  inform you more and explain it better!!! Because I would have took my prescriptions somewhere else. I have been getting glasses for 5 years and I have ever paid taxes on the total!!! I always paid on what my portion was!!! Please read all the reviews before choosing this vision care!!!

resp.text: Thank you very much for your feedback and for the opportunity to allow us to explain the way that we charge our patients for Sales Tax on ophthalmic materials. Our policies are strictly adherent to the guidelines set forth by the Alabama Department of Revenue. We can only control the activities of our offices, and cannot comment on what policies may be in place at other practices you previously visited. At Mobile Bay Vision, we are committed to providing you with excellent care, and we understand how frustrating paying taxes can be. Unfortunately, we do not have any influence on what state law dictates. We can only follow the laws set forth by our lawmakers.

name: Jessica Folse
text: I love the entire building!! The front desk girls are the best! I came in with 3 of my kids and one of them was my 2 year old son, first time at the dentist, who was nearing the end of potty training and after they finished with him, making his first experience an easy one, and while I was in the back myself, they watched him play on the playground. WELL, he had an accident and peed all the way down the slide and they did not even hesitate! They shut the playground down climbed in that slide and cleaned up the entire thing while I was still in the back! They never once made me feel like it was my fault and they actually blamed it on themselves for giving him water. They are always so sweet and accommodating for me with my 5 kids. As long as this place is open I'll never go anywhere else! And Callie Taylor, Dr. Q and Dr. Gast are the best!

name: Bianca White
text: I don't even know where to start. I feel like the staff was very unprofessional. People were constantly in and out of the room, asking questions, getting supplies having personal conversations over my mouth. Which would have been better had they not been having problems fitting the crown but I felt as though they should have been more focused on that than on greys anatomy. We were there for 3 hours for a fill in and a crown. When it was time to check out there was only one person at the desk and a line of people waiting. When asked if there was assistance available the front desk clerk just told us to call back and schedule an appointment if necessary. Which isn't what we needed but we ended up leaving anyway. Definitely won't be going back.

name: Aaliyah Taylor
text: The staff in the vision center here is amazing! Ms. Leah and Brandy were so helpful and kind. I will definitely be back!

name: Water Staff
text: Great staff! The hygienist, Danielle did an excellent job and was very helpful with questions that I had.

name: Brantley Cook
text:
Wonderful dentistry. Assistants were very helpful and provided a pleasant experience. Calm atmosphere. Great service. I can't wait to come back, actually. 9.5/10

P.S.-Ask for Alicia and Gina! They tended to me and were absolutely wonderful!

name: Ultreya Park
text: Dr. Terry and her assistant were great, as was the woman in the glasses area. They were very patient and explained things very thoroughly and were very understanding with a little bit of fear on the part of my family member. A woman in the glasses area brought out about a dozen other choices that they did not have room to display. I was put on hold for 13 minutes, however when I called to confirm our appt., at which point they almost hung up on me before I could actually get all of the information. And then it turned out that they also did not confirm the location, and so when we arrived at the place that I made the appointment for, they told me that the appointment was for the other location. Fortunately, they were not busy and were able to go ahead with the exam at location where we were. All of that could have been resolved though, with simply slowing down during the phone call, and being more thorough. Or use text to confirm! Great once you get there.

name: Laura Coletta
text: The doctors and hygienists are pretty awesome but the girls at the front desk, not that much.

Everyone was great and made going to the dentist fun.

Christie was the best.

name: Mason Andrew
text: I had a really good experience. The doctor took her time with my exam and Danielle helped me with my glasses. I would recommend everyone to see Dr Perry.

name: Shemeka Harper
text: I gave 1 stars because it's been a pleasure working with them . The problem is with payments in between the 2 offices and time wasted since they cant get their financial team together . I have 2 daughters with braces and the same issue . They're payment are current and when it's time for the braces to come off and the bill is paid in full , the mall location sends you to the semmes location and upon arrival there is suddenly a 400 dollar bill that pops out of nowhere . Just today we went for my youngest to have her hard where removed and was told we have a 380 dollar bill due from 2017 .... really ???? Mind you the bill had to be paid in full before the appointment could be scheduled for the hardware removal so how is this even possible ... absolute RIP off of 400 per person when it's time for removal. This is not once but twice for us. This time I'm going to the Better Buisness Bureau

name: Leigh Foster
text: I love this place. The playground is great for kids. I had an eye exam and loved Dr Perry. Danielle was awesome helping me with glasses.

Dr. Perry is fabulous and amazing with her work and absolutely wonderful with children. My so adored her and so do I! All 3 of my children had an appointment with the Dentist today and I had the same result! Their play area and movie room is fanomimal  and it couldn't have been a better experience even with the front desk. I will be coming back. & another plus they take Medicaid for children! If I could I would give them 100 stars but I'm only allowed 5.

I also had to bring my glasses back as the lens were cracked and when I got them back, they were not the same as the first ones.  I had paid extra for the top of the line with all of the add ons and when I got the "fixed ones" back, these were not added to the lenses.  Very disappointed also that if you call close to 5pm, they never answer the phone.

text: New building with new equipment. Was impressed with all of the staff I came in contact with. Friendly, yet professional. Went for a teeth cleaning & check up. I have some sensitive areas and no matter how careful the hygienist are, I end up digging my nails in the chair arm.....The children if they so choose, can enter the building by following the small foot steps leading to the child size door (awesome idea!). Upon entry they will find a separated waiting room from the adults that includes an inside play area and gaming stations. Can't believe I am saying this, but I am already looking forward to my next appointment and would have used the small door if I could fit thru it!

text: MOBILE Bay Dental was awesome I will highly recommend Mobile Bay Dental to family and friends, not only did they made my kids feel comfortable but me also and that is a plus. I will be back for myself. 🤗😄 From customer service to Dental Hygienist they get give stars hands down!!!!😉

text: Everyone is very friendly and professional. It was a very pleasant experience!! I would highly recommend!!!

text: This place is an amazing place to go to for people with children, they have a wonderful staff, they are very kind and well minded, I will be going here every time I need a vision appointment or dental for sure!!!!!

name: Beth Babin
text: The staff are always pretty friendly and the office is amazing. Unfortunately the dentist doesn't seem like he should be working with children. The past two times I have been in,  my son complained of not being numb when they started the procedure and the dentist flat out ignored him.  The first visit (for a pulled tooth) the dentist eventually stopped and gave him another shot, after which he was fine. This 2nd time, we were told we were the ONLY patients in the office, but the dentist seemed inconvenienced to even come in the room,  didn't say 2 words to me and acted in a rush to leave. He started a filling and my son raised his hand and made noises to let him know he could feel it, but the dr kept going and told the nurses "He's fine." Then when my son finally jumped & grabbed his hand, he got aggravated and said to refer us to a pediatric dentist to be sedated. Very rudely made a point to say he wasn't even touching his teeth when he jumped. He didn't even offer to give him another shot or try to comfort him/talk to him about what he was feeling. My son is 11, knows what he can feel & has never had this problem with other dentists. :( I am very disappointed that an office so heavily geared towards children & close to home, has such an impatient & unkind dentist.

text:
The receptionist at the front desk are very unprofessional.  They have bad attitudes, and they are teenagers.  Their customer service was awful.

The One and only positive thing about this place is an assistant by the name of Libby.  She is the best thing at this location.  She was awesome.

text: I have been a patient of Dr. Hankinson since 2005 and his expertise on what he does is amazing. He have a very professional staff and they are always ready to say or do something to make you comfortable. I was in the office about two weeks ago to get a permanent crown on a tooth that I had gotten a crown on about three years ago. Dr. Hankinson replaced that crown because he said that he felt that it should have last longer than that. I did not go in to received a free crown, I thought he could cement the old crown in considering that it was still pretty, but he insist on doing another one free of charge. You really don't see that kind of act of kindness today. He is a remarkable young man and he is very attentive with every patients. I have recommended many people to him and I will continue to do so, and he is VERY SMART. Please check out that SEMMES LOCATIO lt is beautiful. Thanks a Bunch Dr Hankinson.   .NINA BOLDEN

text: I visited Shades Creek dentist today for the first time and my experience was absolutely AMAZING!!! From the moment I walked in until the time I left was nothing short of amazing. text: Hands down the best experience I’ve ever had at a dentist. Extremely nice facility- they have screens on the ceiling so you can see what they’re doing. My husband and I went at separate times and he had an equally as great of an experience. The staff is so friendly and eased my anxiety. They walked me through what they were doing and explained it well. They also went above and beyond working with my insurance company. My teeth were cleaned so well! Could not recommend them enough!!

I had a great experience having a root canal and a crown done at the same visit! (I know root canals don't sound fun, but when you have someone knowledgeable and caring, they are not so bad) Also, leaving his office with a completed root canal and crown, was great for my schedule.
I highly recommend Dr. Macbeth's offce!!!

text: Recently had my teeth cleaned and then a few weeks afterwards had a couple of fillings and a crown put on a molar. I loved the fact that it's a pretty small office so they don't schedule a bunch of people at once, and everyone is warm and friendly.  I've been to places that felt like an assembly line, and this didn't feel that way at all - everyone had plenty of time to chat, answer my questions, and make me feel comfortable. Fillings and crowns are never pleasant, but Dr. Macbeth and his staff did a great job making it as positive experience as possible.  The equipment/technology they use is really amazing and made my dental work a lot easier.  Instead of having a dental mold made and the crown taking two weeks, they scanned my mouth and made the crown in office the same day.  That alone saved me so much time and energy.  I'll definitely be back! N

resp.text: Thank you so much Samantha!  We enjoyed meeting you and look forward to seeing you again!

I asked them to follow up one month later to talk about the outstanding treatment plan, and they called exactly 30 days later. When I asked them for an additional 30 days, they didn’t question a thing. I am the type of person who needs persistence, but hates pestering. Shades Creek Dental provided the perfect balance for me.

I would recommend Dr. MacBeth and his staff to anyone as far as 1 hour from Birmingham. This office is worth the drive!

name: Paul Lawrence
text:
If you need a dentist, no matter where you live, this is the place to be.
The fact that as soon as I walked through the door, Kathy knew who I was and greated me by name despite never actually meeting me before tells you the level of care and detail in your experience.

They were very concise and prompt about everything they did. You are kept fully aware through every single step of the procedures so much that they are actually teaching you about your teeth. You are encouraged to ask questions along the way so you can fully understand and deepen your learning for proactive care in the future. Rhonda was fantastic at facilitating this. A valuable asset for sure.

The facility itself is nothing less than cutting edge. So cutting edge that in every attempt they will reduce the total amount of visits and time spent in the chair in total (as they understand going to the dentist is not typically the top of the list for most people). There’s even a screen on the ceiling so, if you wish to, you can watch and see everything that is happening while they explain it.

It is like being at a 5* hotel- but at a dentist. Not sure I could ever imagine an oxymoron such as this, but Dr. MacBeth and his team have accomplished this. Thank you, congrats, and keep up the great work!

- update 10/4/19

These guys are not only the best, but consistent! Kathy was always smiling and positive at the at the front desk and made sure everything was totally understood so far as billing and working with the insurance.
It was great to catch up with Rhonda again who is so personable and professional in what she does. Thank you!

I had multiple treatments that day - and I was DONE IN 3 hours - including a bunch of fillings and 2 crowns (which they made there and then!) and Shana and Dr MacBeth worked like clockwork to get it done, while having fun at the same time!
The next day I often didnt realise I had it all done as my teeth just felt normal - totally not what I expected. The work is phenomenal!

Totally blown away by this team - sounds strange, but I cant wait to go back!!!

Thank you once again!

resp.text: Thank you so much and we are happy that you enjoyed your visit with us!  We try to make every patient feel as special as you did today and we hope that you continue to share your great experience with everyone!

text: High quality periodontics care and welcoming personnel in a.beautiful setting made me feel comfortable and at ease for having work done by North Alabama Periodontics and Implant Surgery. I was invited in just as soon as I got there and in no time at all everything was attended to. The people are technically highly skilled at their work but they are also very likable. I appreciate everyone trying so very hard to prevent their customers from feeling nervous about any procedure and were frequently checking during the procedures if I was comfortable. The process was pain free due to a quick and easy numbing of the affected area. They are paid by their customer directly but offer to file insurance forms on behalf of their customers  to be reimbursed, provided one is insured. I recommend these folks.

Also, based on the reviews, this was the very first dentist office that I called and I was able to get an appointment within the week! I thank God for that! And thank you, Dr. Macrae and Casey for taking such good care of me and that wretched tooth! 😆😁🥰

name: Melissa Rhoades
text: I have to give a shout out to Dentists 4 Children.  My grandson was very nervous when told he had an abscessed baby tooth that needed to be removed before it damaged his permanent tooth.  Not sure where to go, we contacted Dentists 4 Children.  The office staff was very helpful in the appointment process, getting him in quickly.  Even though my grandson was terrified of the unknown , the staff eased his fear of having a tooth removed, reassuring him he was going to be fine.  My grandson came out smiling, and stated it didn't even hurt.  They also found some other dental issues that needed to be address.  He had such a great experience that it was no hassle getting him back for his next visit.  If you are looking for a professional dentist office for kids, I encourage you to give Dentist 4 Children a try.  Dr. Thornton and her staff is amazing!  I just had to brag and say "Thank you" for making my grandson's experience a good one to remember:)!!

name: Danine Bruner
text: My twins are about to be 12 and they have come here since they were 3. We have always had to have morning appts because my son has special needs. As a special education teacher of preK children, I understand the need for earlier appts for younger children and those with special needs....they are more tired in the afternoon and not as calm. I also understand the reason parents are not allowed back in the treatment area. Many times in the morning, the children will cry for their parents to stay when dropped off at school. The longer the parent stays, the more they cry. Within a few minutes after parents leave, they have stopped crying. I feel the best thing a parent can do is to prepare their child for a new experience by telling them something like "I love you and want you and your teeth to be healthy. I am taking you to the dentist so your teeth can be healthy. I will not be able to go back there with you, but I would never take you to someone who would hurt you. When you go back remember that they are there to keep you healthy. I will be right there to get you when you are finished."

text:
I went to this dentist close when they first opened up.

They said they did 3 fillings but really did four... Not only that but they drilled to far and unfortunately i had to have all of them pulled. I had 3 surgeries trying to correct their mistake before we just had them pulled. i did try to reach out to them but when i called expressing something was wrong the lady in the front wouldnt listen and instead said they would look at it but in a month and said we needed to try and get the others. I had to then switch dentists and since then im terrified to even attempt to get something as small as a filling.

name: Starr Lehner
text:
While I was saying wrong tooth she kept pulling stating she'll get it. I asked why won't it come out. She stated she'll get it.
So she pulled the good tooth and left decayed abcessed tooth beside it.
Wouldn't let me see tooth she pulled.
Had to go to another dentist who very easily pulled decayed tooth. He asked why she pulled wrong tooth.
When partial I've had more than 30 yrs wouldn't fit back I stated maybe because when you pulled tooth the others moved. Oh no that didn't happen. So she grinded on my partial making it for first time ever loose.
Well went back to get partial and they added a metal loop and wrapped it around another decayed tooth. Recently found out (from Dr)acid reflux quickly ruined my teeth. Always was complimented on my teeth and the care I took. So of course it broke off completely.
Of course Signature Smile wants their co-pay money. I sent what I could. Still I suffer. No apology.
Since the ordeal I've dealt with parotid gland pain.
I'm sure because I'm poor and on Medicare (cancer) I just don't meet their standard of a wealthy christian person so it doesn't matter. Wish I could post pictures of my mouth and what I live with because of them.

resp.text:
Starr,

We have tried contacting you directly regarding your review. Our records regarding the visits you mentioned are from 2017 and 2018, and we have documented consents for the treatment you requested. You also have recurring visits for comprehensive care after the treatment was completed, with no complaints or regard for any issues you mentioned in your review. We are happy to discuss this with you further. Our main priority is to give patients high quality care for their dental health and needs. We hope to hear from you soon!

Signature Smile

name: Chris K. Northington
text: I can not say enough good things about Dr. Wilson and his staff at Signature Smile.  They are without a doubt the best Dental practice I have ever been to.  We turned to them to fix my wife's implants/crowns when no-one else in the area could make them look right.  From the moment we walked in the door, we were greeting with compassion and understanding, and assured that they could fix her crowns.  They immediately scheduled an appoint for that same week to do her evaluation.  In that first appointment, Dr. Wilson laid out exactly what needed to be done, gave us a time frame for the work to be completed with cost estimates, and hand made her a set of temporaries that looked better than any of the final crowns from the other dentists we had worked with.  He performed laser dentistry on her gums to give her a bigger smile, used the KOR whitening system to give her a bright white color to her teeth, and put on two new crowns that he gets from a lab in Hollywood, CA.  I can proudly say today that my wife has a beautiful smile that she is so proud of thanks to the work of Dr. Wilson and his staff at Signature Smiles.  They are now offering laser filings that can be done with no numbing or drilling.  If you are a new patient, they offer a free Smile Evaluation that includes a panoramic X-ray.  I have referred many customers to them because of my belief in the work they do.

name: L “lalani wuto” M
text: I have had several occasions to visit Dr. Wilson's dental practice.  I have not ever had less than a wonderful experience.  From cleaning to root canal services, I have had comfortable, painless, and easy sessions with Dr. Wilson and the staff.  He utilizes the latest technology including laser, easy and non invasive X-Ray sessions, and new ways of imagery when viewing bone structure.  I want to also send accolades to the front reception area as well.  The associates are so very friendly and helpful.  They were a great help with my insurance questions and very helpful on every thing I needed as far as administrative information.  I have never had to wait too long for my appointments and felt like I was always visiting family.

name: Mary Robinson
text:
I recently won a Sheer Whitening Gift Certificate at Blue valued at $149. I scheduled my appointment with the dental rep and asked what I could expect. She told me to plan to be there about an hour. They would clean, polish and then give me the Sheer Whitening treatments. Wow, I thought, pretty good prize. I proceeded to ask what kind of whitening treatments they used, 5 day strips, ugh, I thought, oh well.

Unfortunately, I arrived for my appointment about 10 minutes late, however, not intentional. The receptionist was a bit unfriendly and I thought maybe it was because I was late. Shortly, a dental assistant came to me with a clip board and 5 pages to fill out. I completed my basic information and soon realized they were wanting more info than was totally necessary to claim a prize. I began scanning over the pages and stopped immediately. They were asking me everything from signing to consent to pay for the charges they would render to me today and insurance could not be filed to authorizing them to obtain my dental records from my current dentist. I proceeded to the receptionist and told her there was obviously a mistake, I was asked to fill out patient paperwork and that I was only there to redeem my gift certificate. She told me to proceed completing the paperwork so that they could keep it on file. I looked at her in disbelief and sat back down placing the pen under the clip. I guess she signaled the assistant who came out and retrieved my paperwork. I waited for over 30 minutes before they called me back. I followed the assistant back to a dental room and she handed me a box of strips and about 5 minutes of instruction. Do you have any questions? I said, "Are we done?", she said yes that's it. Hmm, so they led me to believe that the cleaning and polishing were part of my prize when really they were going to bill me for this when they were finished. I guess I didn't fall for their trap. Talk about deceitful, a good reputable business does not do business this way. I will not be back. I will still use my strips, but could have got them at Wal-mart for $12.00. What a joke. Watch out?

name: Nichole Riddle
text: My son will never be going back there. My appointment was for 7:45 we arrived at 7:30, just for the doors not to be open. They didn’t even open them till 8 no apology for the wait just plain rudeness. Then when I told them no I’m not consenting to them using restraints or nitrous oxide to help restrain doctor Jones tried to convince me otherwise. I had to explain that I am a medical professional myself and that I fully understand the forms as she tried to continue to speak to me as if I’m dumb. I will never be going back.

resp.text: We're very sorry that you had a negative experience. We strive to provide the best service possible. We would like to know more. Please fill out the form at the link below, and we will reach out to you as soon as we can: https://dashboard.reviewpush.com/35919843/i

text: They take forever to come to the phone and when they do they leave you on hold for an very long time. I literally been trying to get in touch with someone for over an month to get my son braces. Very disappointed.

resp.text: We are truly saddened that your experience was not as great as we would have liked. We take bad reviews very seriously, and we would like to ensure that your experience is better next time.

name: Shondrea Cook
text: Love Vital Smiles for being multi-kid friendly,  however,  I feel the check in system could improve. Maybe off an online portal to update information prior to visit instead of having to physically fill out paper work. For the parent with multiples, this would alleviate unwanted anxiety of the child not being called back at their scheduled appointment time. It would also help, if all children of the same family finish together. Other than that, service is great, staff is friendly and knowledgeable!

name: The Fellowship Through Jesus Ministry Williams
text: The visit was comforting for my granddaughter and my wife was very pleased with the staff and the dentist. We would recommend this office without Hesitation. The staff has changed for the better. Good change.

text: Vital Smiles is a great place to take your children for their dental needs. The place has warm and caring associates from the front desk to the back dental room. Always a great experience. Lily

name: S. W
text:
Front office staff is nice, and that's important as they are the 1st people you see when you arrive. Doctors and Hygienist are extremely patient and nice.

My son no cavities 6 years.
They are a trustworthy company/place. I appreciate their work.

name: Melody R
text: We used to like going here, never really had any problems. Of course there has always been a nice wait time but we decided to continue going there despite waiting a while to be seen. But this last time really made us change our mind. We have 3 children to receive updates on as they are being seen. As I sit down near my youngest daughter, and reach for my phone her hygienist tells me I have to leave because I have my phone out. I'm shocked, because I had just taken my phone out to return a text from my husband  as he wanted to know how the appointments were going. She would not continue my daughter's appointment until she escorted me out of the area. Now I completely understand businesses asking for cell phones to be turned on silent but to tell me that I cannot use my phone AT ALL is completely absurd! I have taken time from my off day to come to this business to bring my children and you're telling me I have to go to a consultation room just to use my phone.  I have already driven 30 minutes to come from my side of town, I  could have easily changed them to a Dr less than 5 minutes from home and had little to no wait time. In addition to all this, I'm trying to get information on my best friend who is in the ICU and no one knows what's going on because I can't use my phone to get the messages. Someone must have notified the manager because she came to talk, but she wanted to do it around my children and that was not going to happen. She should have asked to step away and then we could have talked.......... In other news, we won't be going  back.

name: Elena Sudduth
text: Very organized, clean and friendly environment! I look forward to making Vital Smiles my preferred dentist for my son for years to come!

name: buckybeaver2008
text: Can’t say enough good things about this practice.  Dr. Chet & his staff are top-notch & second to none.  I ended up here as a result of 2 bad experiences with other dentist and I have not been disappointed in the 5 years since being a patient.  In fact my 3 children & 2 sisters have all switched from other dentist and now come here for their dental care.  There is little wait time upon arrival & everyone is very professional.  Dr. Chet is aware of my nervousness when it comes to having any procedure done in my mouth and he makes a special effort to ensure I am comfortable and at ease.  He NEVER pressures you into having expensive work done that’s not needed.  He makes his diagnosis, gives you his professional, honest opinion then leaves the decision up to you. I totally trust his expertise.  My hygienist is Inez and she is the BEST.  You will not be disappointed after visiting Carmichael Dental Care.

name: Tammy Webb
text: Doctor’s office staff was very friendly and Patience with the patient. Nurse is knowledgeable about her work assignment; and knows what she’s doing. I feel good about referring him to any person who is interested in good dental care.

She made me feel very comfortable and not nervous at all. Dr. Chett explained everything in detail that needed to be done , and I am confident because everything he has fixed for me in the past has been excellent
