name: james washington
text: Everyone was nice however, you are asked to pay in advance( which i did) on filling day a different dr who did not scheduled the filling, suggested instead of filling to allow him to fit me for new dentures...me playing alone agreed( I was happy with my old ones)...out of the 207 I paid for copays it was eaten up due to impressions costing 125..ok? Consultation time, im hit with 20,000 work...no way..I wish I would have been told how expensive it would be before suggesting this...that would have been an easy decision..I felt side swipped..so now my 207 copay paid for that experiment..im looking for refund to move on...they put the balance on my husband's cleaning which his insurance pays 80%...I still need fillings, but when I called to ask what can be done? They say you still owe 28.00( my husband) ....im ✔ done...I didn't think that was cool without my consent but it is what it is......and yes, everyone was super nice...will finally get my fillings elsewhere. We moved here from Mobile, been here almost a year.....I really miss my dentist of 25 yrs.....

text:
What a wonderful dental office.  From the sweetness of the receptionist, then the dental assistant it creates a wonderful atmosphere.  Dr Chet is extremely thorough, knowledgeable and looks at the total healthcare of your mouth and surrounding nerve areas.  He is very educated and patient in solving problems.   The toothache that I had was possibly not from the tooth, but surrounding nerve and sinus area.

In addition to the warmth and dental expertise, and highly advanced equipment, they are diligent in keeping the office clean and sterile.   I cannot recommend Dr Chet and his staff highly enough.

text: The staff is always warm and welcoming, Dr. Chet and his dental assistants are super friendly. I love this place, I wish their staff was more diverse but overall great place!

text: Great service and nice workers and best dentist I done been too

name: Kathy Ragsdale
text: The staff is rude, appointments are not available  when they are convenient for you. The office manager is completely rude! I was told that I could bring my children on both confirmations of my appointment. When I get to my appointment I was told to stick my 8 and 10 year old in a car alone in montgomery by their office manager, if I wanted to be seen or reschedule my appointment! If I had been told correctly in the first place I could have made arrangements for my children! On top of that they knew I was in pain and did nothing to address that! I was seated back out in a way over crowded waiting room after being told my children could not be in there and sitting right next to me was a daughter there with her mother Then they asked me to sign some paper releasing them without explaining what the issue could be! Office not to be trusted!

resp.text: Hi Kathy, We are so sorry to hear that you are unhappy with our office. Most people love our office. In fact, many of our new patients are referred to us by their friends and family who have had a great experience here. It is very rare for us to have an unhappy patient, because we prioritize patient relationships. In fact, we record all of our phone calls for quality assurance and to make sure that our staff is NOT rude. You are welcome, if you think it is necessary, to come by and hear your recorded conversation with our office manager at any time. We want to help clarify any confusion. We hope that your children are doing well and are staying safe. We are trying to keep everyone safe with the new Covid-19 protocols. Thank you for understanding, and we hope to hear from you soon. Thanks again.

text: Everyone I dealt with was very kind. This was my first ever dental experience and I was given great care and patience. The office was very clean and comfortable.

name: James Senderson
text: Very good experience and very friendly staff

name: Caroline D
text:
Went in to have a couple of fillings redone and I will never go back to this dental office. During the first numbing shot I had a horrible sharp pain that shot across the entire side of my face the injection was being done on. The pain was so horrible & took me by such surprise, because i have never experienced this before, I started to cry & could not catch my breath. Instead of the dentist stopping after the first shot, asking if I was okay, or even giving me a break to calm down before proceeding with the second one, he completely ignored what had happened & went ahead with the second shot. This was so awful, I still was crying uncontrollably & couldn’t breathe normally. The hygienist was incredibly sweet & rubbed my arm the entire time while comforting me. But throughout the entire procedure the dentist NEVER asked if I was okay after 1) crying & 2) showing anxiety from what was going on. Not even once.
Still currently in a ton of pain on one side of my face from that injection. I understand that these pains can occur, but when I told the dentist after both injections all he said was “yeah that happens”. This is HORRIBLE bedside manner. Patients should be treated with compassion & consideration for how they are doing during every process and procedure. I felt that I was completely ignored & just an “I’m sorry that you experienced that this time.” Or even being asked if I was okay would have been nicer & made the rest of the appointment easier for me. Instead I left upset and infuriated by how ignored I felt I was. Safe to say I will not be returning to this office.

resp.text: This sounds terrible Caroline. I am so sorry a dentist treated you that way. I would like to reach out to you and see if there's a way we can make this right; however, I am having a hard time finding you in our system as a patient. Could you please call Sara at 334-270-9924. I hope you have a good, long, Memorial Day weekend. Take care!

name: SLIMTALL DEEDEE
text: THIS IS THE FIRST DENTIST OFFICE I FOUND WITHOUT MY MOMS HELP AND I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THEM. THE STAFF IS AMAZING, VERY FRIENDLY, NO LONG WAIT TIMES, TEXT REMINDERS, AND GREAT ATMOSPHERE!!! I NEVER TALK GOIN TO THE DENTIST BUT HERE THEY MAKE YOU FEEL LIKE FAMILY AND COMFORTABLE TO TALK TO.. I LOVE ❤️ THIS DENTIST OFFICE

name: Brigitte polk
text: Always professional and caring.

name: Keesha Jones
text: Very caring, personality-plus staff! I have really good teeth and gums, but I had missed several cleanings due to extenuating circumstances. The hygienist noticed that I was suffering from the onset of periodontal disease, and when Dr. K came in, we made a plan to reverse it, which has gone extremely well. I'll be sticking with them!

name: Khalilah Harrison
text: I had an appointment with a dentist in Millbrook on Thursday, and did not like the dentist at all (rude and didn’t explain things well). I called Carmichael Dental Care right after I left the other dentist and they were able to get me in that SAME DAY! After I filled out my new patient paperwork, I was called back in less than 10 minutes. The staff is very friendly. Dr. Chet broke down my x rays and explained everything in simple terms. Because I have a more complex dental situation, let me know all my options and gave me alternative treatment plans, and let me know what the best and worst case scenarios would be. Not to mention, but he’s able to assist you with all questions, even after hours. I don’t ever plan on going to see another dentist. Dr. Chet and his staff are amazing! Thank you for making feel right at home.

name: beardclique 2
text: Great staff friendly and very helpful

text: I wish all doctors took the time to talk to you about your health the way they do. They thoroughly explained any concerns they had about my teeth. Answered all my questions in depth. Were transparent about pricing and insurance coverage. And the hygienists were exceptionally gentle. Not to mention the cool cameras and TVs they had in the room to easily display and explain what they were talking about.   Highly recommend them.

text:
Friendly knowledgeable staff and great dental hygienists who explain what they're  doing.  Dr Shawn Keahey takes time to explain problems, discuss treatment options, and answer your questions

Second post:  impressed with the hygenist takes  pictures of problem areas so you know and understand why procedures are needed.  Dr Keahey doesn't automatically go with a surgical or dental procedure.   But I have to go back.  I got a cavity that needs to be filled and there's  no denying it.  I saw the picture of it.

name: Natoya H
text: They were awesome. Very friendly and professional. Dr. Chet was very courteous and welcoming. You can tell he's very knowledgeable and he makes sure you understand exactly what's going on by breaking down the dentist terminology step by step. I felt very comfortable after seeing that the dentist and assistant/hygienist were very well educated in dentistry. Hope was awesome and very friendly as well. I had the same dentist for 8 years prior to coming to Carmichael Dental Care and I wish I came here sooner. I absolutely loved the technology of being able to see everything as they explain whats going on with your teeth. They make everything affordable and they don't keep you in the office all day. Don't even think twice, try them, you won't regret it.

text: Very attentive and thorough! My daughter was nervous about going but they made her feel comfortable and for that I have no complaints.

name: Thomas Shuster
text: I do not like the pay arrangements. I think that repeat customers should not be forced to pay before services. The whole process makes me feel like I am not trusted or that I am a criminal. Just because a few do not pay, why treat all customers badly. I love the care I get, but the pay process makes me consider finding someone else.

name: Angela Wesley
text: My experience with Dr Chet was very professional, relaxing, comfortable and at ease with providing a very Dr to client communication. I will definitely refer friends and family.

name: Robert Adams
text: Thanks for all the help guys!  You were very professional and detailed. I would recommend you to anyone!

name: Judy Longmire
text: Excellent Staff Everyone Was Extremely Nice

name: Joseph Bass
text:
Dr. Chet really is a very talented guy. He has a great personality that gives you confidence. He will answer any question or concern you have. He spends time with you. Very personable and at the same time all about business.

My experience with the entire staff has been great through each step of my personalized treatment plan. Every single person has been so nice and very knowledgeable. They all speak so highly of Dr. Chet, so that’s a good indicator.

The small things like injecting numbing agents. Literally no pain. I’ve had 4 extractions (5 including the latest). 2 wisdom teeth and two others at a young age to give my teeth more room. I remember a great deal of pressure on my mouth in previous extractions. Not the case here. Very slow and deliberate.

During a recent procedure he was performing an extraction and a bone graft. As he was working with his tech he made the statement “patience will always pay off”. He was spending a lot of time getting any infection out that could cause the graft to not take. This gave me great confidence.

Excellent practice. I look forward to continuing my treatment plan.

name: Cliff Andrews
text: Professional, friendly, courteous I recommend

name: tracy herring
text: Carmichael Dental is wonderful! All their equipment is updated and the latest in technology. Dr. Shawn is is an excellent dentist. I didn’t feel like I was going to go through the roof. In fact, if she didn’t tell me she was about to spray the water I wouldn’t have even known it. Everyone there is so friendly. name: Ieshia Johnson
text: Dr. Chet & his assistant were outstanding yesterday on my first visit. From the moment I entered the dental office I was blown away with the care. I’ve never had a good experience with a dental office so i always avoid going but Dr. Chet has changed that and i trust him whole heartily with my dental care. Usually dentist get in and out but we spent moments practicing his last name, discussing my weird shoes obsession & laughing at the 12 dogs his assistant Samantha has, which eased my anxiety before the extraction I had. I bragged on him and his assistant all night to my family and even tried to bribe them to switch dental offices lol. I was blown away with the updated equipment and the cool camera that takes pics of your teeth instead of the old fashion films they put in your mouth they have you gagging for near life lol. This career choice was truly their calling. Continue to keep up the outstanding work, I’m so happy I stumbled across Carmichael dental care on google as I was searching for a new dental office in Alabama while doing a traveling assignment. Thank you Dr. Chet & his amazing dental assistant.

text: I called Dr. Chet Swartzentruber's office and talked to Ms. Judy, the Office Manager; I was so happy when I found out she worked at Dr. Chet's office. I have known Ms. Judy since my early 20's and she is SUPER NICE and very PROFESSIONAL! I expressed to her I  was in major pain and she asked if I could come in for a 9:45AM appointment and I said yes ma'am I will be there. When I arrived, I didn't know what to expect because this was my first time going to see  Dr. Chet, D.M.D. I got there and the entire office staff was so kind and professional. It’s my turn to  go back and I am really nervous because I am hoping Dr. Chet will be a great dentist and as pain free as possible. I am blown away by the young lady that met with me first to take x-rays. She was so kind and she just really helped me to relax by telling me about how nice and gentle Dr. Chet is with all his patients! Then it's time to meet with Dr. Chet,  he was so kind, professional and thorough. He didn't rush, and he took his time to answer all my questions. He discovered my bite was off and he had to deliver some bad news I have to get some major dental work. But, it has to be done and he is the dentist to do the dental work the correct way and I am at total ease about my upcoming appointment. He is a really nice dentist with an amazing office staff and clinic staff, so if you need a new dentist you should most definitely check out Carmichael Dental Care! Lastly Dr. Chet is a family man, sincere and a Christian these qualities make him even better!! I am thankful I ended up at Carmichael Dental Care.

name: The Teague Law Firm W. Clay Teague
text: I cannot say enough about Dr. Chet and his ENTIRE staff.  Everyone, from Dr. Chet on down, is professional, knowledgeable, courteous, respectful, prompt, and (a big one for me) personable.  I have been going to the same dentist for many years and I was worried about beginning with a new dentist.  My concerns were unfounded.  From the moment I walked through the door, I was treated as though I had been a patient of theirs for years, and it felt that way as well.  The atmosphere is gentle, comfortable, and calming.  My hygienist, Mitzy, was wonderful.  I almost fell asleep in the chair I was so relaxed during my cleaning, and my experience with Dr. Chet was exceptional.  I have had some trouble with a tooth lately and he was able to immediately assess the problem and offer suggestions regarding treatment.  I was very impressed with his skill and knowledge, and, again, friendly personality.  If you are one who does not like going to the dentist or has a fear of the dentist, I think a visit to Dr. Chet and his team will cure that right up.  If I could give this experience more than five stars, I would mark as many as Google would list.  I recommend Dr. Chet and his team to anyone.

name: Kelly Rankin
text: I have high anxiety about going to the dentist and about having any instruments in my mouth. I have had very traumatic experiences surrounding dentist and dental offices. When I called today Carmichael Dental Care staff were very kind and go me into see the dentist the same day. When I arrived in was anxious and could barely stop shaking. Hilary the dental hygienist quickly put my nerves at ease. She was friendly, kind, and supportive. She let me know everything she was doing and explained in detail what she was doing. She explained what I needed to do at home but mostly she calmed me down with kind comforting words. She kept my mind on other things rather than what she was doing. When Dr. Chetan came in he was so warm and kind also. He let me know exactly what I needed, gave me my course of action and explained everything in detail. They both are heaven sent. I walked away knowing in a few weeks I would have all my wisdom teeth extracted but I was not in the least bit anxious or worried. The office staff explained my portion of what I would owe but they made sure my insurance was paying the bulk. They double and tripled checked to make sure I was not paying an lyrics more out of pocket then I needed to. This is a true rarity among dentist and dental offices. I can sing their praises enough. Thank you!!!!! Wonderful staff, hygienist and doctor! I highly recommend them. By the way Hillary is the best. :)

text: I have been going to this office since late 90's. A couple of years ago I started contemplating changing dentist. After today's visit with the new staff, I am completely confident I am at the right office. It was such a positive experience! A very friendly staff and office manager, Mrs. Savage. Michelle did a wonderful job. She made time to review my history before my actual cleaning. She listened to my concerns and was sensitive during the actual exam and cleaning. text: All of the staff were thoroughly professional and personable. An A+ to all and my best "thank you".

name: Quez Axel
text: My experience, phenomenal with excellent customer service. The staff oh my “God” amazing, friendly and very polite. Helped me sign up, explain everything to me and down to what my insurance covers. 1 of the young ladies made experience their very ease and comfortable. Explain what my dental work will extend of. She really educated me on healthy teeth, different structures and frames. I really understood everything she taught me. Thanks a lot!!! And the doctor made my pull of the infected tooth pain free. The numbing process was great. I didn’t feel him pull the tooth, had it out with in seconds. And when the numbing wore off, no pain, no pain at all. I recommend anyone to come here. It will be your best experience of all time. Trust me, It’s your once in a life time experience. I will have the best smile there, they will make sure your smile is your first impression. I will be a recurring patience. Thanks you guys, “YALL ROCK!

name: Connie Barker
text:
This visit was a scheduled cleaning, which I actually enjoyed. Let me tell you why!
I have partial dentures and currently experiencing no problems. But, Alison, my hygienist for this visit, after cleaning my teeth, explained to me what I could expect in the near future.
First, she made pictures of the back of my lower gums next to my teeth and partial. As she pointed out, they were very red. Although there was some redness in front, the redness in the back, which was worse, I hadn't been able to see.  Alison asked if I kept my partial in while sleeping at night.  And I do.  She said that was a NO NO....my gums and teeth needed to be free of the appliance so bacteria doesn't form into tooth decay. So I agreed to stop immediately.  Next she asked about "dry mouth" which I suffer from . She said this is another cause of tooth decay and she offered some mints for me to try which could replace those I currently and constantly use. I could go on and on.....but one more thing. I have suffered from fever blisters all of my life.  Alison noticed the cracks in the corners of my mouth.  She said she would have the dentist write me a prescription for a cream to treat this "viral" condition which should cure this.  Amazingly, when Dr. Chet (sorry, but that's what I have to call him) he brought up EVERYTHING Alison had already been over with me. You know, It's  great to be on the same team!!

name: Jenn Pierre
text: This is the first dentist I've gone to as an adult that made me feel so relaxed and trusting. The staff is very friendly, the hygienists are knowledgeable and both doctors are great!

name: Ellen C
text:
"Do no harm" should be the first rule of order to a "caring" dental practice.  In my case, I was irreperably harmed by an aggressive recommendation for a totally unnecessary treatment, the procedure(S) themselves, performed ineptly by an inexperienced dentist who truly was "practicing" -- I was told he had 10 years experience -- he had four!  What a shame!  for me . . . these guys move on; I, the trusting, unwary patient, am left with the problem their ethics and lack of expertise created.  Thanks, guys!  You ought to be ashamed of yourselves.

P.S.  Why on earth would I now come back to you to "make right" what you did WRONG to begin with!  Shameless be your name!

resp.text:
Hello Ms. Ellen, I am very sorry for your bad experience. We do thank you for your informative feedback, because it helps make us better. We never want to make the same mistake twice. It is unfortunate that one of our dental assistants did not know how long I had been practicing dentistry, and she gave you incorrect information about my years of experience. Please forgive her for misrepresenting this fact which is clearly very important to you. In her defense, it is a little confusing. You see, I am a little older and more mature than others with whom I finished my doctorate training. I had been a civil engineer for 5 years prior to getting into dentistry.

Ms. Clute, if you ever have trouble with the dentistry we have provided, please give us the opportunity to make it right. Additionally, if your new dentist wants to see what you had before our restorations were placed, we can always send them your pre-operative photos. We want to assist you any way we can.

Again, thank you for your feedback.

Sincerely,
Chet Swartzentruber, DMD

name: Lakisha Wright
text: Two months later I receive a bill in the mall when I paid them before I even gotten surgery. Their excuse was it was just a estimate. They wiped out my dental insurance for the year and I had to pay $250 cash. I’m furious

resp.text:
Hi Lakisha, I am so sorry that you are upset. Dentistry is a service industry, and if anybody leaves our practice furious, we have obviously failed them in some way.

Please don't feel bad about not understanding dental insurance. I don't even understand it sometimes. Unfortunately, all we can provide at the time of service is an estimate. I looked back at your account, and I think your outstanding balance is $48.

We were hoping you'd have the chance to come talk with our office manager sometime. We can probably straighten all this out with a face to face meeting.

Lastly, our two philosophical pillars are 1.) quality dentistry and 2.) exceptional patient experience. Please give us the opportunity to live up to our ideals.

Thanks again for your feedback.

Sincerely,
Chet Swartzentruber, DMD

Dr Kennedy and her hygienist, Stephanie worked me in for a quick X-ray & made me feel so at ease and comfortable. After discussing treatment plan I came back a week later  for a procedure. Dr Kennedy and her assistant again provided the utmost care and comfort making sure I was relaxed, free of pain, while enjoying the heated massage chair. I will recommend Dr Kennedy and her entire staff for your dental care. They have totally changed my fear and avoidance of the dentist. I wish I could give more than 5 stars because they exceed excellence in all areas.
Also, Dr Kennedy personally called/texted me the evening after my procedure to check on me. That in itself shows her genuine care for her patients. Very impressive and grateful to be a patient. Thank you Dr K & the entire staff at Cypress Creek.

text: My first experience at Northcutt Dental was wonderful. Everyone was friendly and the dentist and and dental assistants took the time to get to know me and understand the problems I'm having with my mouth. Will definitely be back and recommend!

name: Melissa J
text:
I don't think I have ever felt comfortable going to a dentist, however I look forward to my next visit at Northcutt Dental in Helena!

I don't think this review on my most recent visit does this office and it's staff justice! Warm, welcoming, put-you-at-ease kind of place. They even brought me a warm gooey fresh baked chocolate chip cookie while waiting to be called!

If you're looking for a dentist in the area ... check out Northcutt Dental in Helena. You'll wonder why you didn't come here sooner!

name: Robin Crowder
text: I cannot say enough good things about Northcutt Dental they are AMAZING!!! Everyone is so sweet and knowledgeable. They truly make you at home!  They make sure you understand everything going on and take the time out to answer any and all questions you have. Dr. Yarnell is kind, caring and understanding. Rachael was my assistant and I can’t say enough good things about her!!! Best dental experience ever! They have definitely gained a patient for life!

name: Peggy Griffin
text: There is an incredible, personable staff to greet you the moment you step into a truly relaxing and beautiful office.  The technicians and doctors are well informed and diligent. The equipment is up to date; the experience is  not like being at the dentist. This is a truly good thing!

name: Kabeer Ahmed
text: I had to make a last minute appointment due to severe pain and they were open till 7pm on Tuesday. The service was excellent and Dr. Ward is the best. She explain everything in detail and gave me options. Also I love the fact that they discuss the cost. Going forward i will definitely use Northcutt Dental and recommend to everyone. They are the Best.

name: Heather Brandon
text: Magnificent. Dr. Yarnell and his team are so attentive and great when it comes to nervous patients who fear the dentist like me. I had two cavities filled and I didn't feel a thing. They had no qualms about my request for nitrous oxide and to bring my own music. Constantly checking on me and making sure I was at ease. Highly recommend

name: Dennis Cruz
text: Simply the best dental experience one could hope for. The team there is very professional, considerate and caring. The way they approach things will make one want to continue going there. We are very pleased with this practice.

name: Kabeer Ahmed
text: I had to make a last minute appointment due to severe pain and they were open till 7pm on Tuesday. The service was excellent and Dr. Ward is the best. She explain everything in detail and gave me options. Also I love the fact that they discuss the cost. Going forward i will definitely use Northcutt Dental and recommend to everyone. They are the Best.

name: Linda Goodwin
text: Friendly and helpful in everyday. Love the look and feel of the office.Not like your everyday. Dentist office and staff go all out to make you feel comfortable. Will tell everyone about Northcutt Dental.

name: SFL SNOWY
text: The staff was great . Worked hard to get my insurance worked out. The reviews that says no pain is correct . I did not feel any pain when he injected me nor when he extracted the tooth.  . Everything went great .This my new dentist. Thank you guys.

name: Hayley Boteler
text: Very friendly staff and went over and beyond to make my visit very comfortable.

name: Chelsea Lucas
text: Wonderful staff and so friendly at the Northcutt Dental located in Helena! I typically dread going to the dentist but everyone made sure I was comfortable. They fully explained why I was having certain problems, their recommendation on treatment plans, and other benefits that could help my overall oral health. Definitely recommend this dental practice!!

name: Angel Tillman
text: I really wanted to like this dentist's office.  It's very efficient and clean.  The work is done promptly.  I did not care for the first hygienist I had, so I asked to have her replaced.  The second was much better and the third hygienist was the best I've ever had.  However, when I first switched to Northcutt, it was because my previous dentist retired.  I was told that a filling I had received needed to be replaced.  I was reluctant, because it wasn't giving me any pain or problems, but I had it replaced.  After the replacement, the dentist said he needed to replace his own work (no charge)  so he did.  Then I started having a lot of pain from the 2nd replacement.  He worked on it a 3rd time.  The last time I went in, he expressed that the whole tooth needed to be crowned - lest I eventually need a full root canal.  (this time charged of course)  Needless to say, I will have to be getting a second opinion.  I cannot have the same tooth worked on 5 times unless it truly is necessary.

name: Jody Glass
text: Great staff. Goes the extra mile to make you comfortable. Speaks with you through out the visit to keep you informed.

name: Moth and Wolf
text: I haven't been to a dentist in a long time. They took the time to explain to me what was going on, calmed my worries, and handled me with care. Couldn't recommend them enough.

name: Gene Horton
text:
Kind and gentle care. Very personable staff. And I didn't feel judged for not having taken better care of my dental health. They just wanted to help me get better.

Friendly staff from the telephone call through the stitches.

name: Tamika M. Arnold
text: The staff at Northcutt is always kind and courteous. They also do an amazing job explaining out of pocket cost that allow patients to plan better for future care.

name: Jeremy
text: One of the best dental business I have ever had the pleasure of being.

name: Matthew Stone
text: Had terrible experience with aspen dental. Went to Northcutt Dental and had the best experience.  All the staff is wonderful. They play Christian music and ask if you want to learn more about Christ on the initial paperwork. They are extremely dedicated to comfort for the patient. And they somehow cost less !!!!

name: Hazel Byerly
text: Great place to come if you need dental work done. The staff is nice and friendly and they take really good care of thier patients.

name: Destinee Hill
text: My first visit at Northcut Dental was amazing! All of the staff were very nice and made me feel comfortable.

name: Marsha Tatum
text:
When you enter Northcutt Dental Helena, it definitely is an experience. With the smell of fresh baked cookies & freshly brewed Kureg Coffee what’s not to like about that!
The Business Associate, at the front desk greet you by standing with a friendly welcome home smile, the Living Room is absolutely beautifully decorated and very clean! The whole office is state of the art!!
Everyone from the front to the back is AWESOME!!
Tyndall was my Hygienist. She was AWESOME! She was very thorough & and explained everything to me.
The Whole Team is Very sweet and knowledgeable.
Dr. Yarnell & Dr. Nguyen are both Great!
Everyone was genuine :)
If you are looking for a Dental Family, you should give Northcutt Dental a call today! :-)

name: Jim Taylor
text: Great staff, new equipment, will go here again. Recommended !!

name: Ron Eddings
text: Was treated very well and I received excellent service and treatment. I will definitely return.

name: Kristy C
text: Friendliest staff around!!!! Everyone from the front office staff, to the dental assistants and dentist were all so sweet and courteous. They take the time to evaluate your specific needs and provide you with a detailed treatment plan. A beautifully decorated office that offers extended hours on Tuesdays and also open on Fridays too!!   :)

name: Pete Forbes
text: Very nice professional staff. They explain the procedures as well as the insurance benefits and process. Warm and friendly people. Dr. Yarnell and his team are awesome! I highly recommend them!

name: Scott Howard
text: Knowledgable and delightful staff and an efficiently run process. I can actually say I enjoyed going to the dentist!

name: Teresa Bird
text: Great, friendly and very professional team. Nice atmosphere, calming and relaxed. A great place for the whole family, games for the kids, and tv for everyone while you wait. The staff is very good and you really don't have a long wait time. I would recommend to everyone.

name: John Wall
text: Best dental experience I have ever had. Everyone was friendly and very welcoming

name: W Price
text: Great experience. Friendly staff, very comfortable ambiance, faith friendly. After 5:00 appts available during the week. Highly recommended.

name: Jacyntha Perkinson
text: My family and I absolutely love Northcutt Dental. My kids love their hygienist as well as the assistants! Dr. Yarnell does excellent work and the atmosphere in the office is always pleasant!!

name: Linda ingram
text: I have seen Northcutt Dental commercials for several years but this visit was even better than commercial. Staff was unbelievably welcoming and friendly yet, comfortably professional. I was offered bottled water, watched HGTV with no down time, received attention from at least 4 staffers who all called me by name including a pop in visit from Dr Gyuen  (sic) which was unexpected.  All I can say about Northcutt customer service is wow!

name: Kristy Sellers
text: They are just awesome!  Best dentist I've ever had.  They make you feel comfortable.   They're easy on your teeth.  I had 2 pretty good - sized cavities filled and i dont feel sore like you've been massacred.  They do an excellent job!   If you have anxiety regarding dentist,  you need to try them to try them:)

name: Renee Sloan
text: Amazing staff!  Very helpful, polite, and did wonderful with my 6 yr old when he was scared.

name: David Hernandez
text: Awesome and Friendly Staff. Very professional staff that works as a team. If you need a dentist and it’s an emergency this is the office to visit.

name: Crystal Dietz
text: Today was my first time to go to Northcutt Dental office. From the moment I walked in the door I felt welcomed the staff were so nice. My Family and I won't be going anywhere else but there. Thank you for all the information and wonderful experience.

name: Tammy
text: Everyone was nice and they were all very professional and the work I had to have done was excellent!

name: William Shannan Seelmann
text: The admin staff is friendly and the office is nice and clean. The porcelain crown I had done less than a year ago not only came off tonight but it also has a hole all the way through it. The assistant who adjusted it before it was cemented did not listen to anything I said when she was fitting and drilling on it. I told her the contacts were too tight, but she insisted on adjusting the occlusal (biting surface) until here we are less than a year later with a useless crown. Since we've already moved from Helena, I can't even get Northcutt Dental to make this right. Insurance only pays for 1 crown per tooth every 5 years... I would not recommend this place!

resp.text: I want to thank you for talking with us to discuss your issue. It is our goal to make sure our patients are raving fans of NDP and we want to do all that we can to address your needs upfront. We are sorry that you had this experience and hope you were pleased with our quick response & solution to your concern.

name: Gloria McGee
text: Dr. Ward and the staff at Northcutt are very professional and friendly. The office is very contemporary and welcoming. The staff are all very gentle when administering treatment.  I would highly recommend Northcutt to all for your dental needs.

name: Kakki Brown
text:
A great experience from the moment I walked through the doors! A professional and exceptionally friendly staff who answered all my questions and provided me information to help on future visits. I definitely recommend this Helena based dental practice  to anyone who wants affordable, professional dental care. Special thanks to Dr Yarnell, Tyndall, Sharon, Cynthia, and Katearia. (Hope I got spellings correct!)
Northcutt Dental has become my new dental "home."

name: Alan Farmer
text: The staff at the Helena location are awesome! I took my 16 year old son in for a check-up and cleaning and he really enjoyed it. I highly recommend Northcutt Dental in Helena!

text: Dr. Yarnell and staff are always very friendly and professional. I feel welcomed each time I have an appointment. My family and I are glad Northcutt opened in Helena.

text: Absolutely best experience ever . I have a phobia of the dentist ...and the whole staff put me at ease and was patient with me. The dentist cares and is the first dentist to take my Concerns and fear seriously. I won't be going anywhere else.

name: Gene Darden
text: They are the best   informative, high tech, fun and knowledgable.  The staff rocks from front to back.

name: Zahir Merchant
text:
Stay away if you value your money.

They quoted me $17k for my dental work, went somewhere else (which had to redo my x-rays for free because the Northcutt ones were so poor in quality) and they quoted me for around $4k without my insurance, just around $1.5k with it.

The red flag for me to get a second opinion was when they kept pushing a $15 enamel toothpaste. If you look it up on Amazon, you can get the exact same toothpaste in a two pack for the same price.

If a dental office is willing to sell you toothpaste with a 100% markup, you have to imagine what else they're taking advantage of you on.

To be fair, the staff is friendly, and the office is very very nice with games for kids.

But this price gouging is ridiculous, and I think someone has to acknowledge it.

name: Leslie Miller Hoffman
text: Best dentist office I have ever visited! Staff is awesome!

I've hated going to the dentist for years, but Dr. Yarnell at the Helena office and all of his staff are great.

thanks Nicole an the rest of the staff

text: Very professional and Very good customer service. I came from Florida to Bay Minette for care at this location. The doctor has a excellent bedside manner,  she cares ,she is Good, she helps as much as she can... I am very happy and I highly recommend  NORTHCUTT Dental #1.😁❤️🙏✌🏽

text: I was treated very nice by all staff. And was satisfied with the dental work.

name: sneerious grinch
text: The staff at this dental practice are all beyond amazing. Everyone is very professional and  very organized. I was given a very clear explanation of pricing and procedure. The women up front as well as the techs in the back were very knowledgeable and extremely patient with my dumb questions. The dentist, Dr Peter's is a master at dentistry. She was very thorough with everything and confident in her work. It is obvious she has a passion for what she does. The quality of care that was provided was absolutely outstanding. Any fears I had about having dental work done are gone and I actually look forward to going back. The peace of mind from knowing you are getting the best is worth every penny. I would highly recommend this dental practice to everyone.

name: Tee Huff
text: THIS IS THE BEST DENTAL OFFICE TO COME TO IN BALDWIN COUNTY!! LOVE THE STAFF FROM THE FRONT DESK,  DENTAL ASSISTANTS, & TO THE DENTIST! 😍

Awesome staff! The assistant went out of her way to be sure I was comfortable! She went as far as singing a song for me!

The entire process was excellent. I highly recommend this entire team. This is my second Northcutt location to visit. All I can say is that HR does a great job with hiring amazing employees.

text:
Basically a doc-in-the-box for dentist

Told me one price for an exam and a range for pulling a tooth depending on how hard it was

Charged me more for the exam just to tell me they coulsnt do anything. Wont be back, shouldnt have paid this time

text: My last visit for routine cleaning ended in pain after I can in with no problems.  After 1st followup visit .. pain meds & med rinse prescribed.. I had to return in week bc of continued pain.. My Oral surgeon recommended Antibotics...but Dr Peters would not prescribe.  What!😕

I know that I will be in great hands when it comes to my dental health.

name: Jeremy Mockmore
text: I was beyond pleased with the service at this office, the ladies that helped me showed excellent customer service and patient care was amazing. I’m a nervous wreck at the dentist but once my service was underway I was completely put at ease by how friendly and gentle they were. When I met the dentist she took her time explaining to me what my issues were and the best plan of action to take and why. I’ve never had a doctor of any kind do that for me. I will be returning for all future dental work and I’ve told others how great they treated me.

text: Dr. Tucker and her dental assistant Kennedy did an amazing job working together during my procedure. They made me feel comfortable and provided me with a sense of security during the procedure. GO SEE DR. TUCKER! She is amazing! The staff is friendly and helpful!

text: I hate going to the dentist,  and in fact avoided going for many years.  I've been using Northcutt dental for a number of years now.  Their staff is amazing, friendly,  courteous,  and patient.

text: I absolutely love this dental practice!  Everyone here has made me feel so welcome.  I am impressed with the up-to-date technology they use also.  Their ability to handle so much in their office is also a plus....as well as their hours of operation.  You won't be disappointed! :-)

text: I’ve been going here for 2 years now and I absolutely love the service. I recently switched my children so they now go here too. They are very good at explaining everything in language you can understand. So glad I found them.

text: The entire staff is exceptional, They all work very well together, Great atmosphere. Everyone is very customer oriented and friendly. Twice i have gotten same day service when calling, And the staff met my appointment time with little to no wait. Dr. Knight has been great. He's very informative, friendly and professional.

name: Samantha Day
text: I had a tooth emergency and they were able to see me that day and worked quickly to figure out the problem. All of the staff was very nice and thorough!

name: Zack McGhee
text:
This may be unbelievable, but Northcutt Dental Practice is actually a pleasant place to visit.

I know, I know, what could be so pleasant about a dentistry practice? Everything, to be honest.

The staff are always pleasant and always have a smile ready. They're talkative, and will remember you after only 1-2 visits. Quite a difference from what you will probably find in other practices.

The people actually working on your teeth are very professional and knowledgeable. They know what they're doing and how to get it done with minimal pain. By far the best dental experience I've ever had (and I've had quite a few).

Gentlemen, take note: each and every woman there is a looker. That might not sway your opinion of this establishment, but hey, it doesn't hurt.

In short, Northcutt is the best dental practice around, and if you decide to get some work done, you'll do well to make an appointment with them.

name: Kathy Skipper Buckhault
text: The girls here are friendly,  courteous and treat you like family.   I would recommend Northcutt Dental Practice to everyone.  You can have late appointments, if needed.  I saw Dr. Spivey today and she was amazing.  My cleaning was done by Liz and she was so nice did a great job cleaning my teeth.  Can't wait until February!

text: Visited there for the first time this week and I have to say by far the best all around service I have ever received,From the time you walk in to the time you walk out everyone one of those young ladies was outstanding in there jobs.I highly recommend this place to everyone.(Island Man)

Why are you making me suffer?
Don't go to this place.

name: charity maestas
text: Northcutt Dental of Bay Minette is simply the best dentist in town! I would highly recommend them for all your dental needs! The staff there are the friendliest and make you feel at ease while your at the dentist. They really care about their patients at Northcutt Dental!

name: Courtney Brown
text: By far the best dentist I've been too! Last visit Raven worked with me and she was awesome! So friendly and sweet! Highly recommend Northcutt Dental!

name: Ginger Boutwell
text: Very knowledgeable and friendly staff. Reasonable cost.

name: Kimberly Glidewell
text: I love Northcutt Dental!  All the ladies are always do a great job and are always friendly and professional.  I really recommend them and can't imagine using anyone else!

name: Lechandra Fields
text: Hannah has excellent customer service. She helped me reschedule my appointment and Help me have a better understanding of my treatment plan.

name: Kristen Pickron
text: I've been here 3 times and have been happy every visit.I am absolutely terrified of going to the dentist but they were great.I haven't had to wait no more than 5 minutes to be called back each time.

name: Katelin Denton
text: I do not enjoy going to the dentist but NorthCutt Dental made my appointment go by very smooth and my nerves settle. Raven weaver kept me entertained and my mind was at ease. Because of this I am actually able to say " I enjoyed my visit to the dentist." They have an m amazing crew and it's great to see so many smiles.  Thank you, NorthCutt for the amazing visit.

name: Connie Wilson
text: I am so glad that we found this dentist office. Everyone that we came in contact with was so nice and helpful. It will definitely be our new dentist office. I would recommend them to everyone!

name: Garrett Stewart
text: This office was awesome. It will definitely be my new dental office. I'm so thankful that Raven referred me!

name: Diam0nd Sakura
text: I love this dentist office. The yare so professional and caring. I been afraid of the dentist, but not anymore thank to them..... and  the laughing gas. I've went to being scared to having braces on my teeth now thanks to the referral.

name: Tiz Day
text: Thank you Nortcutt Dental Practice for taking such good care of my family and our dental health.  The friendly staff was so patient and kind with my boys. It is so nice to have a family, friendly business in our a great city.

name: Jessica Allen
text: Love the doctor and the staff! They are so quick and efficient. Last time I was in, my appt was at 8, and I was out by 8:30! Will never have to find another dentist.

name: Kati Roberson
text: Words cannot express the wonderful experience here at Northcutt. From the moment you walk into the door or even a phone call you are instantly family. The doctors, is specially dr. Tucker, know exactly what they are doing to completely ease and take away any potential pain. As someone who has not been to the dentist in a long time and is scared of dentist. This is the perfect place. I swear they are magicians with how easily they fill cavities, clean teeth, and perform surgeries. Insurance or not this is the only place to get your teeth serviced.

name: Taylor Westwood
text: I got my teeth cleaned by Liz she was kind and gentle. Very professional great atmosphere. I love it there!

name: Felicia Amerson
text: Dr Tucker and staff go out of their way to give you the best care!!!

name: Kimberly Johnson
text: They greet u with a smile and are very friendly. The whole staff is great, makes me proud to have them as my dentist.

name: Tammy Butler
text: Amazing staff . Without a doubt the best dentist i ever been to.

name: Gene King
text: My experience at Northcut is always great. If you get Raven as your hygienist you'll get someone who is confident, professional & friendly - like all the rest of the staff at Northcut.

name: Jason Kolbe
text: Love my hygienist and the after 5pm appointments. The staff is always happy and smiling.

name: Will Carnley
text: Highly recommend this place for all of your dental needs! The staff is awesome!

name: Courtney Odom
text: Staff are great and friendly. Love this dentist!!

name: Jewell Henry
text:
I enjoyed the welcome atmosphere the employees are so nice as well as
Dr. West and Raven made the visit seem easy .Ms.Raven understood all my concerns.This is the first time in 30 years I have went to a new dentist I was well pleased with my experience. I plan to continue my dental needs at Northcut Dental in Bay Minette .

name: charlie Stallworth
text: Northcutt Dennis is always off the chain. Whenever I go for my 6 months cleaning I always see Elizabeth Kolbe

name: Damon Anthony
text: Simply Excellent!

name: berry nall
text: Excellent staff and convenient hours.

name: Susie Smith
text: Great experience at Northcutt Dental. Raven was very kind and professional.

name: Andrew Holley
text: Teeth are clean now

name: Daniel Holley
text: Wonderful Service and friendly staff!

name: Ken Clarke
text: They are great
